content:
I think the comments by @Sarvasri address this issue in the forum.
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/what-are-should-be-prerequisite-skills-install-and-configure-site-backdrop-cms
I posted a summary of my ideas in the Forum after studying it. I'm starting over again with MAMP and Backdrop.

I recreated the database, but there is no way to note the hostname because there was no option to select a host name. I can select a host name when I create a user for the database, which I have not done yet because I don't know what to use. % is the default.
